sn3.23:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.23:1.3: “kati nu kho, bhante, lokassa dhamma uppajjamana uppajjanti ahitaya dukkhaya aphasuviharaya”ti?
sn3.23:1.4: “Tayo kho, maharaja, lokassa dhamma uppajjamana uppajjanti ahitaya dukkhaya aphasuviharaya.
sn3.23:1.6: Lobho kho, maharaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamano uppajjati ahitaya dukkhaya aphasuviharaya.
sn3.23:1.7: Doso kho, maharaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamano uppajjati ahitaya dukkhaya aphasuviharaya.
sn3.23:1.8: Moho kho, maharaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamano uppajjati ahitaya dukkhaya aphasuviharaya.
sn3.23:1.9: Ime kho, maharaja, tayo lokassa dhamma uppajjamana uppajjanti ahitaya dukkhaya aphasuviharaya”ti.
